about_the_game:
Dear players, we are pleased to present you a sponsored add-on to the game, for your support we will give you unique customization options that will distinguish you from the other players!

In the packs from the developer we will add a sponsor question in which your nickname will be mentioned, so that all players can see that you support the game. We can also add links to your social networks and add art based on your description. It can be your logo or other ideas you suggest.

Your frame idea will be taken as the basis for new frames, and if your idea comes to fruition, we will give it a unique name at your request.

You will also get a chance to choose the color of your nickname to stand out among the other players.

Please note that it may take some time to fulfill the conditions, as we will need to think carefully and implement all the details. We are confident that the result will meet your expectations, and we will try to do everything in the best quality.

We appreciate your support and are ready to work with you throughout the process to ensure that your requirements are fully met. If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact us and we will be happy to answer all your questions.
